text: Anna Maria Bernini (born 17 August 1965) is an Italian politician, lawyer and university professor. She has been a member of the Italian Senate since 2013. In 2022, she became the Minister of University and Research in the Giorgia Meloni government. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Italian academics Category:Italian lawyers Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna Category:People from Bologna
title: Anna Maria Bernini
